Presented by:
- Groups: Duty, freedom, monolith, scientists, bandits, mercenaries, clear sky, loners, military.

- Monsters: Zombie, bloodsucker, burer, controller, snark.

result.title: Star Wars Pack
result.description:
A great Star Wars mod!

The pack includes characters from the various TV series:

The Mandalorian
Star Wars - Rebels
Star Wars - The Clone Wars
The pack contains:

110 characters
23 blasters and pistols
24 lightsabers
Notes:

Blasters, lightsabers and pistols will need to be enlarged/decreased with Resize
Master Yoda does not stand on his feet. (half turn on gravity)
Blasters do not shoot.
All characters are single layer and droids are double layer.
Commander Luke Skywalker is in Living: Other

result.title: Wendworld Pack
result.description:
Warped World-themed NPC pack!

Includes 15 NPCs!

result.title: WW2 Pack
result.description:
New World War II pack!

It includes:
63 characters:
- Africans
- Americans
- Brits
- Soviets
- Japanese
- Greeks
- Soldiers In Winter Camouflages
- Soldiers in Forest Camouflages
52+ different weapons:
- 17 working
- 30+ non-working
- 3 grenades
- 1 bomb
- 1 mine
- 6 edged weapons
Lots of Different scenery. Both military and natural scenery. Not all of the scenery is in the screenshot, and not all of the characters.

Notes:
- all characters are single-layered
- non-functional weapons will shoot with the "Parent" button
- the bushes are buggy, may not work
- some scenery will have to be enlarged and some scaled down.
- all helmets are bulletproof

result.title: Zombie Apocalypse Pack
